title: Bug 116706Bad Class Cast in IDEReportEditor.java
description: So I'm trying to open a report with BIRT/Eclipse API using the BIRT 2.0 nightlybuild code (as of 11/16/2005).the file IDEReportEditor.java methodprivate IFile getFile( IEditorInput input ){return ( (ReportFileEditorInput) input ).getFile( );}However, input can be ReportEditorInput which is also an IEditorInput (tosupport reports found outside projects and workspaces) which doesn't even have agetFile() method on it. This causes a deeply nested exception that causes thereport desinger to not be able to show a report that might be physically locatedoutside a workspace.
